quest.name: Return to the Rift
journal: Jessie greets you with a grave expression.

You learn from Jessie that a surge of anomalous energy has been detected at the Yawn. After concluding that this is Omega's way of summoning you back to the rift, you agree to meet Cid, Nero, and Alpha at the site.
You rendezvous with Cid and the others at the Yawn, and prepare for your next foray into Omega's perilous domain.

Omega once more sends you through a gauntlet of obstacles for the purpose of reevaluating your combat capabilities. Despite your success, however, the machine seems dissatisfied with your performance, and the ensuing exchange between Omega and Midgardsormr affords a glimpse into their antagonistic past. Cid will almost certainly have thoughts to share concerning these revelations.

※In the event that you leave the Interdimensional Rift, you may re-enter by speaking with the Ironworks hand at the Yawn.
You speak with Cid, and he declares your new base of operations in the rift ready for the trials ahead. The denizens of the “Sigmascape” await...
objectives: Speak with Cid at the Yawn.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Forename, I'm glad you're here. In case you haven't heard, we've observed a huge surge of anomalous energy coming from the Yawn...

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: I've a nasty feeling this means Omega's ready to go ahead with the next stage of its “experiment.” But Master Garlond is on his way, so let's hear what he has to say.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Care to share your thoughts on this, Chief?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Our colleagues on the ground have reported the appearance of “mysterious floating structures” inside the Yawn.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: If you recall, we were investigating a similar anomaly when Alpha and Alte Roite made their appearance.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Omega certainly knows how to get our attention. I blush to recall the eagerness with which we plunged into the abyss, ignorant of the warped gladiatorial contest that awaited us within.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: But what a staggering collection of opponents! Plucked from the pages of both history and fiction for their ability to pose a threat to Omega...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: And should you prevail against these interdimensional champions, what then shall be your prize? Why, a battle against the most devastating weapon this world has ever seen! How marvelous!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...He says with eyes aflame. For once, I wish you were being sarcastic.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Anyway─the energy surge. Based on our previous experience, it seems highly probable that it is our signal to rejoin the fray.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Needless to say, it is an invitation we cannot refuse─not when the alternative is Omega unleashing its creations on Eorzea.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Well, Forename? Are you ready to answer the call?

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Well, I'm afraid Biggs and Wedge won't be answering any calls just yet─they're still mending from the ambush in the control center.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Yes, of course. We'll just have to struggle on without them for the time being.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Don't worry─Nero and I will see to it that you receive all the support you need. Defeat is not an option!

dialogue.name: ALPHA
dialogue.text: Kweh!

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: I do believe Alpha here agrees.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Oh, that reminds me! I've got something special for you, little fellow. Come with me.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: A custom-made Ironworks uniform! Oh, you do look smart, I must say.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: He is part of the expedition team, after all. And considering the dangers lurking in that rift, it's only right that we give him some protective equipment.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: How very thoughtful of you, Jessie. And there I was thinking you were just sizing him up for a new range of merchandise.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Unlike you, I can do two things at once.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I wish I had that uniform...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What about my protective equipment?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Really? I wouldn't be seen dead in it.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: This is perfectly acceptable attire for an engineer. Sturdy, practical, and best of all, most stains will scrub right out.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: I'm not sure it'd last long on you, what with all the fighting, but if you're desperate for a set, you're welcome to have a word with our tailors!

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: You are a famous hero who can afford herhis own gear. I'll bet you could buy a house for the cost of what you're wearing!

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Joking aside, I doubt even a fine uniform like ours would last long on you, what with all the fighting you get up to. We'd need to tailor something specific to your needs, and make it out of far more durable materials. And by durable, I mean expensive.

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: Saying that...if you were in a position to provide said materials, I'm sure our artisans would happily work day and night, all blissful smiles and sparkly eyes, to make you something suitable.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Fascinating though this discussion of Ironworks garmenture undoubtedly is, might our time not be better spent, say, traveling to the Yawn?

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Omega awaits!

dialogue.name: JESSIE
dialogue.text: You'll be on your way to the Yawn soon, I expect. I'd tell you to take care, but... Well, good luck!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Take a good look, Forename. I think you'll find the wreckage down there quite familiar.

dialogue.name: ALPHA
dialogue.text: Kweh? ...Kweh!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hmph. How inviting.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I'm ready when you are, Forename. Say the word, and we'll take the plunge.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Right, then. Into the Yawn we go!

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: I am with you, mortals, along with what scant wisdom I can provide.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Well...the rift seems much as it did before.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: And we appear to be mercifully solid.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Ah, but I do detect some changes. If I am not mistaken, there are fewer “eggs” floating in the aether...

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Welcome, Alpha group. Your prompt arrival is appreciated.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
Omega.
'Twould seem your experiment continued in our absence.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Affirmative. Progress has been satisfactory. Approximately fifty percent of the test subjects have been eliminated.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Each test world hosts an ongoing contest, wherein the strong eliminate the weak.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: The process is certain. Conclusive. Inevitable. Every result matches the predicted outcome.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Every result...except yours.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: <blip> Do these images cause you distress? Please, examine them closely. Without suitable stimulation, you may not exceed your calculated probability of success.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Your survival is crucial to my study. Through you, I must continue to explore the contradiction I have discovered in your otherwise impotent kind. The ability to triumph against overwhelming odds is one which I must acquire.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: Foolish machine. What hast thou to show for all the years that have passed since the culmination of our war? Naught save thy continued existence. Hast thou no thought for what befalleth thy home star...?

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Your attempts to provoke me will not succeed. I will follow my programming. Fight. Win. Evolve. Then I will return to─ <blip> <bloooooop>

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Error. Accurate rendering of planetary label impossible in current mode of communication. Terminating exchange and returning to priority experiment.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text:
Alterations to equipment parameters detected. Recalculating projected combat capabilities... <blip> Complete.
I will now commence recording your practical performance.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Proceed, Alpha group. Overcome the obstacles in your path, and reach the end of the course constructed for you.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: It seems we have our orders. Shall we cut a path through the chaff, then?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Ah, those are some nice...cards? Which means... One moment. Card...game...play...play! You mean to play a part in proceedings this time?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Of course that's what you meant. Well, we do have authorization to fight in this area of the rift, so I suppose there's nothing to stop you from joining us. Welcome aboard, Alpha!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Right, are we ready to─ Ah. Apparently not.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Fortunately for you, I came prepared for the occasion. Heh heh heh... What a perfect opportunity to field-test my latest creation!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Behold! The Mark XLVIII Iron Nero, complete with the new and improved Mighty Mjolnir gunhammer!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Step aside, Garlond, and bear witness to the devastation!

dialogue.name: GARLONDGATEKEEPER
dialogue.text: Good eveningmorrowday to you, madamsir. Will you be descending into the Yawn?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Enter the Interdimensional Rift?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That seems to be the end of them...and of the path, as well.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text:
<sigh>
As far as operational duration goes, that was pushing the limit. Still, it should suffice...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: In between scrambling to stay out of the way of Nero's new toy, I found myself wondering about that card you used, Alpha. Care to explain?

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: He boasteth that it is but one of many tools at his disposal.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: Be not deceived by his appearance. Like all of Omega's creations, Alpha was chosen for his prowess in battle.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: <blip> Analysis complete.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Results match revised projections. At this rate of improvement, you will fail to qualify as subjects of note. Midgardsormr, your parameters are notably inferior.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: Dost thou yet believe me the mighty wyrm I was in life?

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: That incarnation perished long ago. My fate was sealed the moment I delivered my spawn unto this far-flung star.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: That they might be suffered to remain, I did offer up my life unto Hydaelyn, abiding thenceforth in spectral form─a servant to be summoned in Her hour of need.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Your account correlates with my records. It explains why I arrived on this planet only to find that my journey's purpose was lost. Of necessity, my priority shifted to repairs even as I searched for a new target of sufficient strength.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Yet I still do not understand why you aid these creatures.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: I should think the reason plain...but mayhap 'tis not so for a soulless machine such as thee.

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text: By thee and thine was my home laid waste. The sound of thee, thy very scent, visiteth upon me a tempest of rage. I but lend these mortals what little aid I can render.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: Illogical. If your purpose is to facilitate my destruction, it would require an entity more powerful than you were at your prime. Without the means to muster such might, your presence here is meaningless.

dialogue.name: OMEGA
dialogue.text: The experiment continues. Alpha group, your next opponent awaits you within the Sigmascape. Enter, and commence the contest.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: The “Sigmascape,” eh? I shall set to work analyzing the unspeakable horrors within.

dialogue.name: ALPHA
dialogue.text: Kweh...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...That should do it. Our new base of operations is up and running!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Now, what I'd really like to do is delve a little deeper into Omega's past. But as our dragon seems disinclined to indulge my curiosity, we had best focus on the task at hand.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Let's get on with conquering the occupants of this “Sigmascape,” shall we?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
There's no avoiding this “evaluation.”
Let's watch our step though, eh?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
One of Omega's monitors...
On your mark, Forename.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
Bah, of course it's shielded!
Leave the barrier to me.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text:
Alpha, mind the─ <sigh> Trap.
Well, you're stuck for now.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That's that taken care of...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text:
Hmph. Child's play.
It's been a poor welcome thus far!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: ...Let's just move along, shall we?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
...Forename? Alpha?
They're not here!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
We've arrived on different platforms...
Come, Nero, we have to find them!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text:
Ah, we have other visitors first.
And they don't seem keen on letting us pass.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: My, aren't there a lot of them.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You just had to bemoan our “poor welcome,” didn't you...

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: You cannot blame a new employee for craving a challenge!

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text:
No sign of thy companions.
Fight on, mortal.

dialogue.name: ALPHA
dialogue.text: Kweh-kweh!

dialogue.name: MIDGARDSORMR
dialogue.text:
Oho, a timely trick.
Thou didst mimic the action well.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
Over there! A flash of light!
It could be Forename and the others.

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text: Splendid! Let's get on with it, then!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
Was that one of your cards!?
Good work, Alpha!

dialogue.name: NERO
dialogue.text:
Finally, a proper challenge.
I trust those tedious barriers are behind us?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text:
It would appear so.
Let's finish this!
